page.title: 14POPULATION & OCCUPATIONS
page.content:
The{population}of the given block is (at the time of writng) 106 adults 34 children of these, 55 adults are males 51 adults are females 18 children are boys 16 children are girls
The{occupations are as follows:- 10 Working Farms and Forestry Worker. 1 Caravan and Camping Park. 2 Hotels, 2 Cafes and a Restaurant. 3 Shops. 1 School. 1 Post Office. 2 Builders. 3 Merchant Navy Engineers. 17 Retired People. 7 People travel outside to work. 1 Mini golf Course. A panel of 4 doctors have a Surgery in Rosedale twice a week.
